程序包 org.apache.pulsar.broker

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    BookKeeperClientFactory
    Provider of a new BookKeeper client instance
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BookKeeperClientFactoryImpl  
    BrokerData
    Data class containing three components comprising all the data available for the leader broker about other brokers: - The local broker data which is written to ZooKeeper by each individual broker (LocalBrokerData). - The time average bundle data which is written to ZooKeeper by the leader broker (TimeAverageBrokerData). - The preallocated bundles which are not written to ZooKeeper but are maintained by the leader broker (Map).
    BundleData
    Data class comprising the short term and long term historical data for this bundle.
    ManagedLedgerClientFactory  
    MessagingServiceShutdownHook  
    PulsarService
    Main class for Pulsar broker service
    TimeAverageBrokerData
    Data class aggregating the short term and long term data across all bundles belonging to a broker.
    TimeAverageMessageData
    Data class comprising the average message data over a fixed period of time.
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    PulsarService.State
